Uses of Class
org.opends.server.replication.protocol.AckMsg

  • Packages that use AckMsg 
    Package Description
    org.opends.server.replication.server
    This package contains the code for the Replication Server part of the Multimaster replication feature.

    • Uses of AckMsg in org.opends.server.replication.server

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract AckMsg ExpectedAcksInfo.createAck(boolean timeout)
      Creates the ack message to be returned to the requester server, taking into account the information in the received acks from every servers.
